org.matsim.contrib.noise.handler

Class NoiseEquations

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.matsim.contrib.noise.handler.NoiseEquations

  • public class NoiseEquations
extends Object
    Contains general equations that are relevant to compute noise emission and immission levels, based on the German RLS-90 approach 'Lange gerade Stra√üen'.
    Author:
    lkroeger, ikaddoura
